page.title: 04School Dinners
page.content: At English Bicknor school we have a very good meal service.Here is a typical weeks menu: {day 1}cowboy hotpot,scalloped potatoes,carrots,sweetcorn;chocolate crunch and raspberry sauce. {day 2}Beefbugers,chipped potatoes, baked beans in tomato sauce;apple pie,custard. {day 3}Roast beef,Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes,green peas,gravy;fruit jelly,cream. {day 4}sausages,creamed potatoes,baked beans in tomato sauce;apple turnover, custard. {day 5}shepherds pie,croquette potatoes,carrots,peas;cherry crunch.
